HomePage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. It showcases products, promotions, and navigation links to various product categories and support resources.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Link to the Dyson homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field for products and parts.

elements.name: Shop Now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the Vacuum & wet cleaners product category.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the Air purifier product category.

elements.name: Headphones
elements.description: Link to the Headphones product category.

elements.name: Lighting
elements.description: Link to the Lighting product category.

elements.name: Support
elements.description: Link to the Support page.

elements.name: Best sellers
elements.description: Link to the Best sellers page.

assertions: The 'Search products and parts' search box is present
The 'Vacuum & wet cleaners' link is visible

DysonIndiaPage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. It showcases various Dyson products and provides navigation to different sections of the website.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Link to the Dyson homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Shop Now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the Vacuum & wet cleaners product page.

elements.name: Hair care
elements.description: Link to the Hair care product page.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the Air purifier product page.

elements.name: Headphones
elements.description: Link to the Headphones product page.

elements.name: Lighting
elements.description: Link to the Lighting product page.

elements.name: Support
elements.description: Link to the Support page.

elements.name: Best sellers
elements.description: Link to the Best sellers page.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.'
Page contains the text 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI'

ProductsPage.description: This page indicates an 'Access Denied' error when trying to add a product to the cart. The user does not have permission to access the specified URL.

elements.name: Access Denied Header
elements.description: The main header indicating access is denied.

elements.name: Error Message
elements.primary_locator: text=You don't have permission to access
elements.description: The paragraph explaining the access denial.

elements.name: URL
elements.description: The URL that the user is trying to access.

elements.name: Reference Number
elements.description: The reference number for the error.

elements.name: Edgesuite URL
elements.description: The URL for the edgesuite error page.

assertions: The page displays the 'Access Denied' header
The page displays the error message 'You don't have permission to access'
The page displays a reference number
